scenario_text.value:
There... All of her followers are taken care
of. Now’s my chance!

It’s me, Miyuki! It’s Takuma!
Please, you’ve gotta listen to me!

Come on, open your eyes already!
We made a promise, didn’t we?!

That we’d save the world, and go back home
together...with everyone!

At this rate, your precious brother...
Haru will be lost to us!

(Just now... Miyuki returned to normal for
a second there!)
Miyuki!!!
Grrrwlll!

...Damn, my voice can’t get through to her
anymore!

Something’s missing, but what...?
I just want to save her!
I just want to go back home with everyone!

Hold it together, Takuma!
Your voice reached her once, didn’t it?!

That means we can bring her back! Don’t give
up!!!
Agumon...!
GRRRRRRWLLL!

You’re right. I can’t give up here. I won’t!
I’ll never give up!

Lend me your strength, Agumon!
We’ll bring her back!
We’ll save that kind girl...Miyuki!

We’ll all go back to our world!
Together!!!
...UWOOOOOOH!!!
Agumon?!

Roar with me, Takuma! I need to hear your
voice... More, MORE!

You got it, Agumon!
...UWOOOOOOH!!!
...UWOOOOOOH!!!

Here it comes...that warmth from deep inside!
Takuma’s feelings are filling me... HAAA!!!

Incredible...power, like none I’ve ever felt
before...is welling up from inside of me!
Agumon, warp evolve tooo...!
WarGreymon!!!

Incredible, Agumon...no, WarGreymon!
This is our new power...

Let’s keep going, Takuma!
Our voices will save Miyuki!
